General.Name: Decai Decoration Co Ltd
General.Description: Decai Decoration CO.,LTD engages in the architectural decoration project and construction business in China. The company engages in the interior decoration and building curtain wall engineering for hotels, administrative office and office buildings, cultural, educational, sports and health buildings, commercial exhibition halls, other urban public buildings, airports, subways, and other public transportation facilities, as well as batch family houses. It also designs, develops, and constructs intelligent buildings, energy management systems, intelligent transportation, intelligent medical care, and intelligent city system engineering systems; protects and repairs ancient buildings and modern buildings, such as garden landscapes, courtyards, film and television bases, and ancient cities of cultural tourism. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Qingdao, China.

1.Name: Ms. Wenjing  Wang
1.Title: CFO, Sec. of the Board, Deputy GM & Director
